name: The Route T-shirt
description:
Now you can be a part of The Route, as seen on Chelirious.com. 

Sport this "T" and people might mistake you for a newspaper delivery carrier! Blessed!

Order online from Zazzle for specific size, material and shipping:

http://bit.ly/8JbTcM

name: The Route: Confessions of a Newspaper Delivery Carrier (paperback)
description:
Finally, after waiting over a year to get your hands on a paper-back version of The Route, it's here.

Experience The Route in all its glory - from beginning to end. 

Ships in 3â€“5 business days

Description
-------------
The Route is the true autobiographical series of a newspaper delivery carrier's daily chronicles. Find out how newspapers are really delivered. From behind closed doors, you'll follow the daily adventures of a new delivery carrier from the very first day on the route to the last. How are papers really delivered from warehouse to front porch? How much do newspaper delivery carriers get paid? Who are the mysterious people we never see but take for granted? 
I delivered newspapers to the residents of a suburban town in Central New Jersey. This is my story.

Purchase online for print edition ($12.50): http://bit.ly/4u1WMb
